Info

Defines class ATSCli with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for checks and loads an information argument parser.

class ats_utilities.cli.ATSCli(info_file: str | None, verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class ATSCli with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for checks and loads an information argument parser. Command-line interface configuration.

It defines:

attributes:
_config - CLI configuration object.
_operational - Status for tool | generator (default False).
_verbose - Enable/Disable verbose option.
methods:
__init__ - Initials ATSCli constructor.
_builder - Builds ATS cli configuration.
is_operational - Checks is tool | generator operational.
add_new_option - Adds a new option for the the CL interface.
parse_args - Parses the CLI arguments.
process - Processes and runs tool operations (Abstract).
_builder(info_file: str | None, verbose: bool = False) → CfgBase | IniBase | JsonBase | XmlBase | YamlBase | None[source]¶

Builds ATS cli configuration.

Parameters:

  • info_file (<Optional[str]>) – Information file path | None

  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Returns:

CLI configuration object | None

Return type:

<Config>

Exceptions:

None

Adds a new option for the CL interface.

Parameters:

  • args (<str>) – Arguments in string form

  • kwargs (<Any>) – arguments in Any form

Exceptions:

None

Checks is tool | generator operational.

Returns:
